comment_body:
That's why you always call dibs on everything, even evil stuff, since fun is number one priority!

And heyy, it's you! I like the story, short and simple. There's twist too, which I also like :D
Could have a better buildup though, since the "fucked up" comment came out of nowhere, especially since the narrator is apperantly one of them too. Self deprecation is a great humor tool though, so props on the narrator.

Thank you bud! Glad to see you liked it. 

  
I would've spent more time on the build up but honestly I was too tired to think of anything; however, I think I may post more frequently.

  
You my friend, have a good day! :D <3
No worries about it! Hope to see more stories from you soon. See ya later, and have a good day too friend! =D
